events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with a solid background in backend development and cloud services.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience in software development and DevOps practices.
A recruiter with expertise in engineering roles was assigned to the candidate to ensure smooth communication and interview scheduling.
The initial screening was conducted via phone to discuss the candidate's technical skills, work experience, and cultural fit for the software engineering team.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to moving forward in the process and expressed availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview was scheduled with the lead engineer to evaluate coding skills and architectural knowledge on April 5th.
